title: Eliphaz Accuses Job Again
summary: Eliphaz delivers a sharp accusation, listing hypothetical sins Job might have committed. He urges Job to return to God so he can be restored, continuing the belief that Job's suffering is punishment for wrongdoing.

faq.question: What kind of sins does Eliphaz suggest Job committed?
faq.answer: Withholding help from the poor, mistreating widows, and oppressing others.

faq.question: What does Eliphaz recommend Job do?
faq.answer: Repent and return to God to be healed and restored.
